content.query:
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://saprojectmaestrosnd.blob.core.windows.net/raw/Unemployment.csv', 
    FORMAT='CSV',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) AS [result];


SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://saprojectmaestrosnd.blob.core.windows.net/raw/Unemployment.csv',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) AS [DATA]; -- 1545 records

SELECT industry, unemployed
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://saprojectmaestrosnd.blob.core.windows.net/raw/Unemployment.csv',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) WITH (industry VARCHAR(255),
    unemployed INT)
AS data;

------CREATE DATABASE---------
CREATE DATABASE pro;ject_db;

--- FIXING THE COLLATION ERRORS EXPLICITLY

SELECT data.industry, data.unemployed
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://saprojectmaestrosnd.blob.core.windows.net/raw/Unemployment.csv',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) WITH (industry VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_KS_SC_UTF8,
    unemployed VARCHAR(255) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_KS_SC_UTF8)
AS data;

--CHANGE COLLATION FOR ENTIRE DATABASE

ALTER DATABASE project_db
COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_KS_SC_UTF8;


SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://saprojectmaestrosnd.blob.core.windows.net/raw/Unemployment.csv',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) AS [DATA];
